metro.TrainManagement.Trains

Class TrainOverseer

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.TrainManagement.Trains.TrainOverseer

  • public class TrainOverseer
extends java.lang.Object
    The TrainOverseer holds all trains and provides an interface to interact with and modify them. All the template trains are stored here as well. Constants of Trains (like their price) aren't stored in this class but in the metro.TrainManagement.Trains.Train class.
    Author:
    hauke

    • Method Detail

      • getTrains

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Train> getTrains()
        Returns:
        A list of all trains.

      • addTrain

        public static void addTrain(Train train)
        Adds a train to the list of bought trains. This method does not check for any valid trains (not null, etc.)!
        Parameters:
        train - The new train to add.

      • removeTrain

        public static void removeTrain(java.lang.String trainName)
        Removes a train from the list of bought trains. This method does not check for any valid trains (not null, etc.)! This method will also add the price of the train to the players account.
        Parameters:
        trainName - The name of the train that should be removed.

      • getTemplateTrain

        public static TrainTemplate getTemplateTrain(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a train template by giving its model name.
        Parameters:
        name - The model name of the train.
        Returns:
        A new train template object.

      • getTemplateTrains

        public static java.util.ArrayList<TrainTemplate> getTemplateTrains()
        Returns:
        A list with all available trains. This does NOT mean that the player already bought them, they are just available for him.

      • addTemplateTrain

        public static void addTemplateTrain(TrainTemplate train)
        Adds a template train to the list of them.
        Parameters:
        train - The template train that should be added.

      • getTrainByName

        public static Train getTrainByName(java.lang.String trainName)
        Searches for a train with the given name. When there's no train with this name, this method will return null.
        Parameters:
        trainName - The name of the train.
        Returns:
        The train or null when this train doesn't exist.

      • sellTrainFromLine

        public static void sellTrainFromLine(java.lang.String lineName)
        Removes all trains from the list of trains and adds the money to the players account.
        Parameters:
        lineName - The name of the trains that should be removed from the list.
